::Autofire::

"This isn't my base," Autofire informs the Quintesson, glancing at 
Scourge. He puts away his weapons. "And I don't sceme. I'm loyal to 
whoever hires me." He adds and then turns to Scourge.

"Autofire," he replies to the bot's question and then asks his 
own. "Who're you?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Autofire's gun reveals the Quintesson. "Put down your hostilities
> Decepticon, I am not your enemy." He then moves forward. His face 
whirls
> and changes, and starts to spout some more words, "Probability of 
you
> scheming is around 56%, with your reaction inside your own base"  
he says,
> announcing the fact.
